name: Record Wave transactions for new Google Sheets rows
description:
This template shows how to export your bank or credit card statements to Wave. Every time a new row of expense (or income) is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create an accounting transaction in Wave. 
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Lkltj7IHbQY5afWRBKPelup80jfgPV7pRLGMUpL4K6k/edit#gid=2109159956).
